svg.title: Test: width:auto; height:70px; width="49%" height="10" viewBox="0 0 1 1"
svg.desc: This testcase checks that the intrinsic ratio will be taken from the 'viewBox' attribute when the CSS 'width' property is set to 'auto', the 'height' property is set to some other value, and the 'width' and 'height' attributes do not provide an intrinsic ratio. You should see a blue square with sides of length 70px when viewing this file.
